meanings.definition: The lower part of the pharynx.
meanings.sent1: The hypopharynges help in swallowing food.
meanings.sent2: Doctors examined his hypopharynges to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The hypopharynges decided to throw a party for the tonsils.
meanings.sent4: Her voice echoed through the hypopharynges of the room.
meanings.sent5: The hypopharynges, like a gateway, lead to the stomach.

meanings.definition: The area of the throat below the oropharynx and above the larynx.
meanings.sent1: He felt a tickle in his hypopharynges, causing a cough.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her hypopharynges to determine the cause of her sore throat.
meanings.sent3: The hypopharynges were jealous of the attention the uvula was getting.
meanings.sent4: His words got stuck in the hypopharynges of his throat.
meanings.sent5: The hypopharynges, like a bridge, connect different parts of the throat.
